title: @Riot Zed changes
body:
How are you going to change {{champion:238}} in the upcoming patch.
are you going to nerf him to bits like you did {{champion:38}}. 
or are you going to focus on his tower dive potential and change that.
I would like to know what your are going to do to zed and other assassins such as akali.
I do not want a fight I just want to know your opinions on assassins and counterplay issues.

replies.body: Yeah, lets nerf tower dive potential so the game is even MORE passive!

So you're saying if they nerf Zeds tower dive potential the game is more passive, yet how would that affect the overal game since Zed is banned in most games?

Not to mention id argue that Zed being able to switch with a shadow 1000 range away as "passive".
they reason they will probably nerf zed is because he lacks a bit of counter play im okay with a small nerf but if they do what they did to kassadin with him I think a lot of people will be mad.

Even if his dive potential was nerfed, he would still be an excellent tower diver.
Not to mention, a big part of the dive comp is bruisers/tanks that can dive fast and hard, so having Zed to follow that up is still a pretty powerful combo.

I didn't say I want them to nerf tower dive potential on zed
I simply asked if they are going to change that on zed or something.
